alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Butler (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 04 at 8:43PM EST until February 06 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Portions of west central and western Pennsylvania, including the following counties, in west central Pennsylvania, Butler. In western Pennsylvania, Beaver. * WHEN...Until 100 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 841 PM EST, emergency management reported that minor flooding was continuing due to an ice jam. Several roads in Franklin Township were affected, including Lend Street, Burnadette Street, Short Street, Sherwood Drive, and Lakeview Road. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Zelienople. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
